title: Where's the Ap nerf on Conqueror
body: It is way to strong on mages. Kassadin and Cassiopeia are already powerhouses lategame, now they get 70ap with deathcap equipped from conqueror and 15% healing. It's way to good and if it was op on melee champs it would of been hotfixed already.

replies.body:
They can't really change the adaptive force without either nerfing melee as well or splitting the stats (which is hard), but I could see them adjusting the healing.

If the healing was 10% of all damage done, doubled for attacks/spells with less than 400 range, that could work

It needs to do less for ranged champs. Way too strong on them.
oh it works on Ryze?I gotta play Ryze now he must be even more degenerate than usual
you can also get 500 mana from the new presence of mind

It's not that OP on Kassadin, into matchups you don't need fleet, its better to run electrocute. His conqueror winrate is high, but thats due to people taking it into matchups you don't need fleet for, which ofc gives him a good winrate. We can tell this is true because electrocute has double its pickrate while also having a higher winrate. Kassadin already gets enough healing from W and lich bane proc with single target ravenous hunter healing anyway. Conqueror Cassiopeia is actually OP though and conq should be nerfed for ranged.
